item.title: 【General Music Discussion】DSD Conversion tool
item.description:
Hello lovely music lovers.

I had one query,is there any software that allows to convert DSD512 files to DSD128 as my FLAC player doesnt support beyond DSD128.
Foobar converts in wav not DSD.
Any guidance is appreciated.
item.author: samir4u123

item.title: 【Apple Music】WEB-RiP - Mary J. Blige - Family Affair (Edited Version) (1080p)
item.description: JRiver Media Center software is possible. But it's Paid application.
item.author: vitalya3
